trans-unit.source: Determines the alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'allineamento di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is to be anchored toward the left or top end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, depending on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> orientation.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> deve essere ancorato verso l'estremità sinistra o superiore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, in base all'orientamento dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />, items marked as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left" /> are aligned to the right side of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> è <see langword="Yes" />, gli elementi contrassegnati come <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left" /> vengono allineati sul lato destro dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is to be anchored toward the right or bottom end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, depending on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> orientation.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> deve essere ancorato lungo l'estremità destra o inferiore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, in base all'orientamento dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />, items marked as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" /> are aligned to the left side of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> è <see langword="Yes" />, gli elementi contrassegnati come <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" /> vengono allineati lungo il lato destro dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
